attributes.action: limit the number of terms a future Prime Minister can sit to two.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent UK political history has shown that Prime Ministers who have "outstayed their welcome" has concerned much consternation amongst their parties as well as to the wider political audience and the general public.

For this reason it is proposed to limit the number of terms a Prime Minister can serve to terms (a term being the time between two general elections, or between assuming the office and a general election)
